description:
When you're coming into a corner too hot, or facing a gnarly stretch of slab, powerful brakes are a beautiful thing. An evolution of SRAM's Guide brakes, they have significantly more stopping power and stiffness. Tech from the world-cup winning Code brakes gives the G2 R confidence-inspiring bite and reduced fade. The lever uses a larger pivot and more precise bushings for durability.

  • Tool-free reach adjustment
  • DirectLink lever delivers precise control and a very connected feeling
  • Power reserve geometry mimics your fingers natural motion for a comfortable squeeze
  • Bleeding edge port makes brake bleeds easier
  • Matchmaker™ X compatible clamp cleans up your cockpit
  • Power organic pads offer great modulation and bite
  • Direct mount for 180mm rear rotor, 200mm rotor up front
  • Front hose: 95cm, rear 200cm
name: SRAM G2 R Hydraulic Disc Brake
